scripts.test: cypress run --browser chrome && npm run generate:report
scripts.generate:report: mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json > cypress/results/reports.json && marge cypress/results/reports.json --reportDir cypress/reports/report.html --inline
scripts.open:report: open cypress/reports/report.html || start cypress/reports/report.html || xdg-open cypress/reports/report.html
